title: Grilled Halibut
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon vegetable oil', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon black bean sauce', '125ml mirin (Japanese sweet rice wine)', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '6 (115g) fillets halibut, skin removed', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '1/4 teaspoon pepper', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander']
